All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiError
Represents an API error with details such as status, timestamp, error message, and request path.
AppController
The AppController class is a Spring MVC controller responsible for handling requests related to the "/app-controller" endpoint.
ApplicationConfig
Configuration class responsible for providing essential security beans.
AuthenticationController
Controller class handling authentication-related endpoints.
AuthenticationRequest
Represents a request for user authentication.
AuthenticationService
Service class handling user authentication and related operations.
ChangePasswordFromLinkRequest
Represents a request for changing the user password using a link.
ChangePasswordRequest
Represents a request for changing the user password.
CollectionAddRequest
Represents a request for adding a new flashcard collection.
CollectionRepository
Repository interface for interacting with the database for FlashcardCollection entities.
FiszkiApplication
Main class for the Fiszki application.
Flashcard
Represents a flashcard entity with information such as author, collection, category, words, and examples.
FlashcardAddRequest
Represents a request for adding a new flashcard.
FlashcardCategoryLimitRequest
Represents a request for limiting the number of flashcards retrieved based on category.
FlashcardCollection
Represents a flashcard collection entity with information such as ID, collection name, and author.
FlashcardCollectionRepository
Repository interface for interacting with the database for FlashcardCollection entities.
FlashcardCollectionResponse
Represents a response containing flashcard collection information, including the collection name and associated flashcards.
FlashcardController
Controller for handling flashcard-related operations.
FlashcardIdRequest
Represents a request for a flashcard identified by its unique ID.
FlashcardInfoResponse
Represents a response containing information about a flashcard operation or request.
FlashcardRepository
Repository interface for interacting with the database for Flashcard entities.
FlashcardReturnResponse
Represents a response containing information about a flashcard, including its ID, author, category, words, and examples.
FlashcardService
Service class for handling flashcard-related operations.
JwtAuthenticationFilter
Custom JWT authentication filter that intercepts and processes JWT tokens from incoming requests.
JwtService
Service class responsible for handling JWT (JSON Web Token) generation, validation, and extraction of claims.
OtherException
Custom exception class for handling other runtime exceptions.
PointsRequest
Represents a request for updating user points.
RegisterRequest
Represents a request for user registration.
Role
Enumeration representing user roles in the application.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for security-related settings in the application.
TokenInstance
Singleton class representing an instance of user authentication token information.
TokenValidityRequest
Represents a request for checking the validity of a token.
TokenValidityResponse
Represents a response for token validity check.
User
Entity class representing a user in the application.
UserDateResponse
Represents a response containing user information.
UserDeleteRequest
Represents a request for deleting a user account.
UserInfoResponse
Represents a response containing user information.
UserLevelResponse
Represents a response containing user level information.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing user data in the database.
